messages.title: Local Candidate for Local People
messages.content: On 8 June, families in Eastleigh can choose between a Labour government that stands up for the many, or the Tories who only look after privileged few. Our NHS is at breaking point and waiting lists are still climbing.

messages.title: Labour's pledges to you:
messages.content: Protect living standards and create jobs. Introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour and invest in infrastructure, skills, and new technology.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Defend our NHS and tackle the care crisis. Give the NHS and social care services the money they need.
Give all children a chance to achieve – Provide universal free school meals for primary school children and reduce class sizes.
Provide affordable homes to rent. Build one million new homes in five years and guarantee 3-year tenancies for private renters.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If every Labour supporter voted Labour instead of tactically voting for the Lib Dems, Eastleigh would have a Labour MP.

issues.education: Provide universal free school meals for primary school children and reduce class sizes.
issues.health: Defend our NHS and tackle the care crisis. Give the NHS and social care services the money they need and join up services from hospital to home.

housing.content: Provide affordable homes to rent. Build one million new homes in five years and guarantee 3-year tenancies for private renters.

quotes.text: THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS WILL SAY AND DO ANYTHING TO GET ELECTED. THEY BROKE THEIR PROMISES BEFORE AND THEY WOULD DO IT AGAIN.

images.caption: Students – let down by the Lib Dems
